snippet: Opposition to Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan isn’t about a park. It’s about a power grab.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Seyla Benhabib holds demonstrations that have engulfed Istanbul reflect deep resistance to increasingly authoritarian behavior by Turkish Prim Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan; cites several political moves by Erdogan that indicate growing influence of Islamist interests and government assault on political and civil liberties.
lead_paragraph: Opposition to Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan isn’t about a park. It’s about a power grab.
